name: Throw
description:
Your pet mini-world fell out of its container. What better way to put it back than to throw it there?

If you want to rate the game for Ludum Dare please use the original files, not the post compo ones.

Walkthrough

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LROWRArUJSg

All graphics, sfx and music made by me during Ludum Dare #38, except the font:
Poiret
by Denis Masharov - https://www.behance.net/user/?username=denis_masha...

-SomethinBoutGames
